edu.umd.cs.psl.optimizer.conic.ipm.cg

Class ConjugateGradientIPM

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.optimizer.conic.ipm.IPM
      • edu.umd.cs.psl.optimizer.conic.ipm.cg.ConjugateGradientIPM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConicProgramSolver

    public class ConjugateGradientIPM
extends IPM
    Primal-dual short-step interior point method. This IPM solves the normal system using an iterative conjugate gradient solver.

      • CG_MAX_ITER_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String CG_MAX_ITER_KEY
        Key for integer property. The ConjugateGradientIPM will throw an exception if the conjugate gradient solver completes this many iterations without solving the normal system.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CG_REL_TOL_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String CG_REL_TOL_KEY
        Key for double property. The conjugate gradient solver will terminate as converged if the residual is less than this value times the initial residual.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CG_DIV_TOL_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String CG_DIV_TOL_KEY
        Key for double property. The ConjugateGradientIPM will throw an exception if the conjugate graident solver reaches an iterate whose residual is at least this value times the initial residual.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
